channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 6 Tested Safety Apps for Personal Protection (2024)
item.description: Your smartphone or wearable could be a lifeline in emergencies. These apps could make all the difference.

item.title: 11 Best Cheap Mattresses, Tested and Reviewed
item.description: These Are Our Favorite WIRED-Tested Mattresses You Can Buy Online for $1,000 or Less.

item.title: How to Use a VPN to Watch to Netflix When You Travel Overseas
item.description: You may not be able to watch some of your favorite shows because of regional streaming restrictions. Using a VPN service is a handy workaround

item.title: Apple Mac Mini (M4, 2024) Review: A Small Yet Powerful Desktop
item.description: Apple’s basic desktop computer is now a bit smaller and slightly more powerful, but it’s not for everyone.

item.title: Apple iMac (M4, 2024) Review: Small but Worthwhile Upgrades
item.description: It’s round four for the iMac on Apple silicon. Turns out the first time was the charm, but this one’s great too.
